data.name: We Are OFK EP
data.detailed_description:
From Indie Pop Band OFK


The debut 5-song indie pop EP from Los Angeles band OFK, stars of the interactive making-the-band narrative series - We Are OFK. This EP follows the emotional twists and turns of each member's struggles to understand what they want to create, and why they do it.

EACH SONG WILL BECOME AVAILABLE WHEN ITS FEATURED EPISODE RELEASES!
  • August 18: "Follow/Unfollow" + "Fool's Gold"
  • August 25: "Infuriata"
  • September 1: "Footsteps"
  • September 8: "thanks,"
